level.heading: Chief Clerk and Chief Inspector not to act as deputy.
level.text: After April 2, 1938, neither the Chief Clerk nor the Chief Inspector of the Department of Human Services of the District of Columbia shall act as a deputy to the Director of the Department of Human Services of said District.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Office of Director of Public Health abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-101.
